plot: Poetic dream or tragedy of humanity? Six cameras. One heart that beats. Intermingling and discrepancy between sounds and images. One voice that leads the audience into a world where Death does not exist.
title: WWW: Walk With a Woman
plot_es: Poetic dream or tragedy of humanity? Six cameras. One heart that beats. Intermingling and discrepancy between sounds and images. One voice that leads the audience into a world where Death does not exist.
plot_en: Poetic dream or tragedy of humanity? Six cameras. One heart that beats. Intermingling and discrepancy between sounds and images. One voice that leads the audience into a world where Death does not exist.
